name: Blackout Shoot (Pedresper)
description:
Top view pixel art shooter - Become a Western Legend, shoot inner a saloon full of thugs and enemies and if you can you'll be the last man standing.

How to Play:

Levels - Try to beat all the thugs through 12+ levels, each level gets harder and harder with new challenges, choose also between 3 difficult modes: Baby (easy), Let me Shoot (medium), I Like Whikey (Hard).

Buttons - Use the arrows to walk through the level and the spacebar to shoot and confirm commands.

Help us improve, give us your feedback and we'll take note: https://forms.gle/6q4j6DsigPBx1pRC6
